thread.title: Any free Doom3 skybox textures of earth?

post.date: Posted: Sat Oct 07, 2006 6:57 am Post subject: Any free Doom3 skybox textures of earth?
post.author: ajm113
post.body:
I need some skybox textures for my map that I am making that is based on earth and will need a skybox of sky of the earth. Does anyone have any skyboxes that they made that can let me download for my mod?

Thank you. Sorry for any misspelled words but I am tierd.
_________________
